issue.title: [Java] Combine MapVector and NonNullableMapVector Classes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1866](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1866). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`NonNullableMapVector` class can be merged into `MapVector` and removed as part of removing the non nullable vectors.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1866?focusedCommentId=17585784) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
